 2019-12442019-08-21NRCAN,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
PrecisAppointment of DAMIEN CÔTÉ of Montréal, Quebec, to be a full-time Commissioner of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and his designation as Lead Commissioner of the Canadian Energy Regulator, effective August 28, 2019.
